meanings.definition: A loose outer garment worn by some Muslim men.
meanings.sent1: He wore his jubbahs to the mosque for Friday prayers.
meanings.sent2: The jubbahs were hanging neatly in the closet.
meanings.sent3: The jubbahs danced in the wind like colorful flags.
meanings.sent4: His collection of jubbahs was a rainbow of fabrics.
meanings.sent5: The soft fabric of the jubbahs swirled around him as he walked.

meanings.definition: The plural form of jubbah, referring to multiple loose outer garments worn by some Muslim men.
meanings.sent1: In his wardrobe, there were various jubbahs of different colors.
meanings.sent2: The group of friends all wore their jubbahs to the special event.
meanings.sent3: The jubbahs at the market stall seemed to be having a party of their own.
meanings.sent4: The jubbahs lined up on the shelf like soldiers ready for duty.
meanings.sent5: The jubbahs fluttered like a flock of birds as they walked together.
